name: Koffee Time
description:
You love music ?
You love games ?
what about a game where you control a flying Koala in a mug destroying everything it touches, IN SPACE !

So grab your favourit mp3 from your hard drive and let's play with a level automatically generated with it !

This game is made for #destructionJAM by @jjeromegerstch and @polygonalmind !

 Enjoy !

To play, select your song (any mp3 file that you have on your PC) with the koffee machine select button then use the mug with drink me written on it to launch the game.

Destroy a maximum of props tby touching it to make the greatest score !

Have fun !
